testcase.classname: feature to test invalid login scenario
testcase.name: Check login is unsuccessful with invalid credentials:
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enter Memo and memo123............................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then an invalid credentials message is displayed............................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test invalid login scenario
testcase.name: Check login is unsuccessful with invalid credentials: 2
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enter Admin and admin132..........................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then an invalid credentials message is displayed............................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test valid login scenario
testcase.name: Check login is successful with valid credentials:
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enter Admin and admin123..........................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed
